name: Blue: Noodle
description:
You are now present in a place dedicated to noodle. You can just walk around, listening to people and have fun, or be a nice(?) person and also have fun.

  Made for the I Can't Write jam host by charlmes  

Thank you so much for the opportunity!  

There are multiple endings, choose wisely!

If the font appear weird, try install the font in the game folder.

Warning: Some part of the game might made those who are easily disturbed uncomfortable(though, not too much). Please keep this mind when playing.
